name: First Steps
description: Learn the basics of planet management and resource gathering. This tutorial will guide you through selecting your planet, building your first mining station, and understanding the core game mechanics.

tutorialSteps.text: Welcome to Overlord! Click on your planet to select it.
Great! Now open the build menu to see available structures.
Select the Mining Station from the list. Mining stations generate minerals each turn.
Confirm the construction. The mining station will be built on your planet.
